pages.title: Description
pages.text: Goblins are small and extremly angry. Will attack on sight.$(br)Locations:§1 Plains, Badlands, & §1Cold Areas$(br)Variants: $(li)§1OP $(li)§1Demon $(li)§1Frost $(br)Size:§1 .75 scale $(br)Weapon: §1Spear$(br)Hostility:§1 Goblins will attack §1all players at any time $(br)Health:§1 300$(br)Damage:§1 30$(br)Tier:§1 1
